Replies.Reply: Transform and flee, Kranix! You must warn all you meet of the horror of Unicron! Suddenly, the pitiful creature is surrounded by the strange energy cloud and it looks like his body has simultaneously caught fire and been doused with acid.
Arblus!   No!
The world of the savage Sharkticons and their cruel masters the Quintessons.
Guilty or innocent, the sentence is always the same - death!
A planet six times the size of this one that absorbs everything in its path.
Spare me this mockery of justice.

Characters.Character: MOONS ORBITING CYBERTRON IN DEEP SPACE

Replies.Reply: There are TWO MECHANISTIC MOONS orbiting the huge planet Cybertron. But we are most concerned with a small, greenish metal one.

It is the year 2005. The treacherous Decepticons have conquered the Autobots' home planet of Cybertron. But from secret staging grounds on two of Cybertron's moons the valiant Autobots prepare to retake their homeland.

At first, we see nothing unusual or suspicious. Then, pulling closer, we see that the top of the moon is covered with moon camouflage "netting" and underneath it is a huge cache of futuristic weapons. This is the Autobot staging ground for an assault on Cybertron. DOLLY THROUGH THE COMPLEX until we arrive at a Command Center where several Autobots peer into monitors, running constant surveillance on Cybertron.
Every time I look into this thing, my circuits sizzle. I'm tired of this waiting game, Prime. When are we gonna start bustin' Deceptichops?
Then let me make another run to Autobot City on Earth. I'll bring you back more cubes than you'll know what to do with.
YAHOO!
Your days are numbered now Decepticreeps.
Will do, Spike.
If I can dodge Dececpticon rays, I can sure as shootin' dodge a couple of asteroids.
Fat chance, Megatron!
We still don't have enough Energon cubes to power a full scale assault, Ironhide.
Jazz,    report security status.
Dinobots.    Destroy Devastator!
That's a question you should ask yourself.
as he lifts chunks of broken concrete and catches the laser dagger on it, tossing it aside as he lunges at-
You who are without mercy now plead for it. I thought you were made of sterner stuff, Megatron!
Never!
as he lies on an improvised bier-like platform, a profusion of electricity discharging tubes and "plasma" bottle devices hooked up to his arms and into his gaping middle wound.
Nor was I, but one day, an Autobot shall rise from our ranks and use the powers of the Matrix to light our darkest hour.
Arise, Rodimus Prime.
Alright, ready the shuttle for launch.
What about Moon Base 2?
Commence countdown, Cliffjumper.
Now, all we need is a little Energon and a lot of luck.
Megatron must be stopped.
No matter the cost.
smashing through a wall of lesser Decepticons.
One shall stand, one shall fall.
Out of the way, Hot Rod.
No sign of Decepticons in this sector, Prime.
Jazz to Moon Base 2.
Jazz to Moon Base 2.
We're about to send up the bird. Any Decepticon shenanigans in your sector?
Where'd that come from?!
Talk to me, Earth! We got a situation out here!
Hit it!
Let's burn rubber!
This is the second moon. It is much closer to Cybertron than the first one.
Bumblebee and Spike here.
All clear, Jazz.
This thing - this juggernaut just ripped the first moon to shreds.
now with a new bumpersticker which is a Unicron with a red circle and slash through it, looks very fidgety.
Let's get out of here.
It isn't even dented.
Hey,   Ironhide, tell my son, Daniel, I miss   him, and tell him I'll be coming home   as soon as we've kicked Megatron's tail   across the galaxy.
It's like a terrible nightmare, Ultra Magnus.
And it's heading this way.
If this doesn't do it, nothing will.
Let's get out of here!
We're being sucked into it!
Shut off the control, Daniel. Daniel looks around.
Shoot it, Son.
Use your exo-suit.
Son.
You did it!
Who cares? I'm more worried about where it's going!
Hurry!
Slow down, Ironhide. We want to get to Autobot city in one piece.
You were saying?
Die Autobots!
This was almost too easy, Starscream.
You're an idiot, Starscream. Were we simply to wipe out that minuscule base, they could build another one.
But when we slip by their security systems in their own ship and destroy Autobot city, the Autobots will be vanquished forever!
Such heroic nonsense!
He's furious.
You imbecile, our cover is blown!
Attack!
Breach their defenses!
Soundwave!     Jam that transmission.
Constructicons merge for the kill!
as he commands his troops.
Their defenses are broken.    Let the slaughter begin.
Prime!?
Why throw away your life so recklessly?
Farewell, Prime!
No more, Optimus Prime!    Grant me mercy, I beg of you!
Fall!   Fall!
I would have waited an eternity for this.
Enshrine me!
Wait, I still function!
Who said that?
Show yourself!
Nobody summons Megatron!
State your business.
You have nothing to fear. I have already crushed Optimus Prime with my bare hands.
The point is, he is dead!   And the Matrix died with him.
Why should I? What's in it for me?
I belong to nobody.
No, no. I accept your terms.   I accept!
is cut in half by Megatron's blast.
as SCAVENGER MELTS HIM DOWN.
as a Laser BLAST hurls Bombshell up and out of sight and causes Shrapnel and Kickback to get sucked into the vacuum.
As they enter the now empty ship, a number of Decepticons flood past them, taking positions and searching for other living Autobots.
Much easier, oh mighty Megatron, than attacking the real threat: the Autobots moon base.
He ducks away from the door.
I'm hit!
It was your stupid strategy!
Pathetic fools!
Agggggggh!     My foot!
How do you feel, Mighty Megatron?
Take this scrap to Cybertron!
Replies.Didascalie: (drops Megatron's hand coldly, calls to other Decepticons)

Replies.Reply: Astrotrain, take off.
Fellow Decepticons, Astrotrain has requested that we lighten our burden!
So I hear a second on that?
And against?
The ayes' have it!
Oh, how it grieves me to do this.
Wanna bet?
Well, as Megatron has, how shall we say -
Get on with the ceremony! Dirge and others react to EERIE SOUNDS and look up and off. Starscream looks where others are looking and reacts.
Who disrupts my coronation?
Megatron, is that you?
The Shuttle just zipped past checkpoint zeta.
Hurry or we'll miss it!
Hey!   Let me out.
But we're not supposed to go beyond City limits!
Hot Rod, look! There's a hole in the shuttle!
also leans against it, his small legs churning.
Kup, Hot Rod! Look!
THEIR P.O.V. - THE CONSTRUCTICONS  as they start linking themselves together into enormous  DEVASTATOR.
Dad!
But what about my dad? He's on the moon between that monster and Cybertron.
All right!
That was close!
Where are we, Springer?
Wow! That was better'n the Roller Coaster at Future World!
Can I help, too?
Wow! Dad's exo-suit. He told me about it but I never saw it.
brows knitted, thinking.
This must be the junk capital of the universe!
This exo-suit is fantastic!
Want me to do that?
What do I do?
Wooooh!!
Ultra Magnus!
They're everywhere!
And Kup and the Dinobots!    We're saved!
Wow!
Where's Hot Rod?
He looks o.s. towards the others.
I'm okay.    They don't even see me.
Cliffjumper! Jazz!
Bumblebee!     Dad!
What do I do? It doesn't have any buttons or anything.
But I don't have a gun.
Starts frying the command console!
I can't stop it!
turns around and sees this.
Dad!
Daniel, a classic twelve year old American boy watches the portable viewer which is like an over-sized Boy Scout compass. WIDEN SHOT to show he is at an old fashioned "fishin' hole" on Earth -
as he gets inside the "suit" which fits over his body like a grid-work metal "cage."
an "adolescent" Autobot. He is in robot mode, sitting with his fishing rod held between two fingers, looking bored with it all.
lopes up hill after Daniel.
Why settle for a peek when you can see everything from Lookout Mountain?
Chromo-Chicken!
This is it! Now take a squint through those babies.
What!?
Decepticons!
This is for Ironhide.    As so's this!
Hang on!
Yiiiiiiiiii!
Not bad for an old timer!
Save it.
Wrong!   They're our way in!   Yaaaaaaay-
Hey, I wasn't worried for a micro-second, Arcee!
Replies.Didascalie: (likes her, too, but tries to be cool and collected)

Replies.Reply: That's showing him, Optimus!
Optimus!    Forgive me!
Prime!
And what are we going to do when we get there? If that thing crunches moons, it'll make short work of us.
You're right! It can.
It's just a feeling.
You got 'em!
Yaaaaaaaaho! We're airborne!
gives the thumbs up gesture.
Don't you think we have better things to do now than tell stories Kup?
Like maybe figure out how we're gonna stay alive.
Time out, for Cybertron's sake!
They're closing on us!
Yeah, how'd you beat them?
That'll tear the ship apart!
Okay, so you were right.
They're coming back.
Whew!!!
Dive!
Kup!
Fires at the Squid, but not stopping him.
Don't worry, I'm not coming after you.
lowers his head and blows blast of air through head-piece. The air blast clears the water, revealing Kup's head and torso half buried in the "sand"
Kup!   Say something!
Really?
Universal Greeting.
Or our faces.
This is getting expensive.
I thought they were supposed to reciprocate.
A lot of good it's done us so far!
I can't transform!
Unicron?!    Who's Unicron?
I wonder if there's any connection between it and Galvatron.
Sure, that's all I got to think about.
I have nothing but contempt for this court.
Wish you'd figured that out a little sooner.
They've got more Sharkticons than we have photon charges!
Didn't even bend a fender.
We can't hold out forever, but we can give them one whopper of a repair bill.
I never thought I'd be so happy to see those big bozos.
But what about our problems.    We need a ship.
Who are you.
HOT ROD He'll be mine too, if he can find a Quintesson ship.
That's a ship?
Guns aren't exactly friendly.
What was the Universal greeting again?
Bah weep graaaagnah wheep ni ni bong?
Bah weep graaaagnah wheep ni ni bong?
Where did you learn to talk like that?
The matrix!
The matrix will not fail us.
Then we've got to trust in ourselves, and no matter what they odds, destroy Unicron.
I don't believe it.
Doesn't it remind you of something, Kup?
Battle stations!
The Autobot Matrix!
Not by a Decepticon.
Gasps.
Optimus!
This is the end of the road, Galvatron.
which resides within the "bowl" created by the City structure and natural surroundings.
disgustedly watches Hot Rod drive up the mountain.
Cam bustin', turbo revvin' young punk.
What's that darn fool doing? Hound looks up and points.
Old timer?! That's something you'll never be if you don't get back to the city. You know what we used to do with cocky, insubordinate upstarts?
The Insecticons are in our way.
He said "later!"
Keep at it, Springer, lad! Help's at hand!
Together now!
That did it!
Devastator!
That's his fight, lad!   Stay away.
knocks two Decepticons on their tails and turns.
Finish him off, Prime!   Do it now!
What do you know about it lad?
Look!
Grimlock, get your noodle out of my face!
You're living one now!
Engage the boosters for Cybertron's sake!
I'll give you Petro-Rabbits. Contact!
I remember it well.
Like what?
Yep, like the shrikebats of Dromedon!
Oh yeah, we inversed polarities.
You got a better idea?!! With that, the ship seems to stop, on a dime, in mid air! The missiles zoom past it.
Don't run your programs until they're debugged.
Let's just hope we've screwed up their trajectories.
Yep, I thought we'd had it that time for sure.
Fix me!
There's a piece missing.
Well, I still think I'm short a part!
Replies.Didascalie: (moving up and back, bending arms and hands, CREAKING, CLUNKING, SQUEAKING)

Replies.Reply: But all things considered, you did an amazing job, lad! Amazing!
Yeah, you even got rid of a nasty burr on my rotator! Now, let's find the Dinos and get off this twisted planet!
Don't act hostile. I'll use the universal greeting.
Watch.   I'll have them eating out of my hand.
See, the Universal Greeting works every time.

Now, without making any sudden moves, give them an Energon goody. Kup reaches into his belt, presses a button and pulls out an Energon cube. Hot Rod, somewhat suspicious of the whole process does the came.
Customs vary from place to place.
Experience, lad. You should learn to appreciate it.
They're restraining bolts, lad.
But what if they're innocent?
So that's the monster's name.
Not the end I'd wish for, lad.
Remember when you put me together today?
I know what part you forgot.
Better late than never!
Let's hold a demolition derby! Then, he roars into a bunch of them, slamming a massive stack into the wall.
Yeah, but look. There are a lot more of those cam dinging, grill-crackin' things.
I think the problems on this planet will be solved very shortly.
Don't hold your breath, your majesty.
Neither are they in case you haven't noticed.
looks around nervously.
And with it, all hope.
Nope, never seen anything like it.
Debugoids!
They must not programmed to catch flesh creatures.
I knew you had potential, lad!

Characters.Character: MOUNTAIN ABOVE AUTOBOT CITY- LOOKOUT POINT

Replies.Reply: Hot Rod arrives at a viewing platform carved in mountainside and TRANSFORMS back to humanoid mode. Daniel rushes to a set of PUBLIC VIEWING BINOCULARS and peers into them.
Firing out of the hole.
Decepticons!
Hot Rod pulls Daniel back as Megatron's BLAST SHEARS OFF the VIEWING PLATFORM which crumbles and falls down the steep mountain!
Come on down, Autobrat!
I am a triple changer. I am worth any two of you. I should run things.
as Hot Rod tumbles, he covers Daniel with his arms and tries unsuccessfully to slow his fall.
who is flying nearby.
A little heavy on the electrons.
with Daniel race toward Autobot City, transforming into vehicle mode as shots gouge the terrain around them.
Blaster, Ultra Magnus sends orders to contact Optimus Prime for reinforcements.
Run, Blaster! Save yourself!
You think you got through to Prime?
With an accelerated ignition procedure the ceramic housings might create a magnetic flux.
The composition of this planet seems to be a chaotic amalgam of discarded ferrous and non-ferrous articulations.
Be sure the fittings are securely welded!
It appears that my lacerations were primarily superficial.
Your estimated survival time is 10 seconds.
Perhaps they're not as vicious as they look.
I wouldn't count on that!
HIS P.O.V. - EVEN MORE JUNKIONS ARISING OUT OF THE JUNK HILLS  as Junkions newly risen from Junk look up and point at Cruiser and make hostile signs toward it, shaking weapons, etc.
Springer, Arcee, transform Autobot City!
You can explain your security violation later, Hot Rod! Now, man your battle station.
Jazz!   Cliffjumper!
Autobots, prepare to board the shuttles.
Daniel, I'll do everything I can for Spike.
Maybe the Matrix can stop it.
To the shuttles!!!
And you'll die trying just like Megatron!
Kup, Hot Rod. Get the Dinobots out of here!
Hurry!
What?
Remember what we did off Beta Four!
Congratulations Autobots, we've lost 'em at least for a while. So rest up. We'll refuel on the Junk Planet and work out our battle plan there.
Kup! Raise your force fields at once!
Moleculon Missiles!
I can't deal with that now.
Then that's exactly what they're gonna see.
Brace for impact!
How's that?
We might be able to salvage this thing.
Decepticons!
We've got to draw them off and then double back to the ship!
Perceptor!
He stands and shoots.
Then use that time to escape! The Matrix was designed for an emergency like this.
Until all are one!
Damn it!   Open it!
Prime, you said the Matrix would light our darkest hour.
You have ships here?
We're outnumbered!
I got better things to do today than die.
Looks like we're shipmates, squirt!
But if you get space sick, you're gonna walk home.
Jump.
Believe it or not, this is the fun part.
He says "go for it!"
Replies.Didascalie: (ENTERING SHOT, reaches in and pushes joystick forward)

Replies.Reply: It ought to be smooth sailin' from here on in.
Kup and Hot Rod just bought it!
Face it, Magnus, the Decepticons 're gonna dog us until they see us dead!
Seeing how they would have detonated four quarters, I think it was a good choice.
The place where everything ends up after you throw it out.
He says the planet's made of junk.
Replies.Didascalie: (opening hull door with a RIPPING OF METAL)

Replies.Reply: It's rough out there, kid. Stay inside and play with crayons or something.
Just think about what you want to do before you do it!
Don't fight it Dan-O.
Show time's over! We've got work to do!
Cancel that last order.
Ultra Magnus!
But what if it doesn't work.
Get gone!
It's not hard to knock 'em down. It's getting them to stay down that's the trick.
Positive thinking gets    on my nerves.
Listen,   I don't want to rain on anybody's parade,   but how are we going to move the army to   Unicron. We don't have enough room on   that ship.
What's he talking about?
This is what I call traveling in style.
Sees something in the distance.
I don't know, but I hope they didn't get him.
I'm almost out of energy. Suddenly, he looks up and sees one of the creatures explode above  HIM.
That's what I call the nick of time.
who are trailing Megatron, attack the fast CLOSING CITY, trying to GNAW AND DEVOUR their way through the PORTS and BRIDGES leading inside.
Delicious, eh Shrapnel?
Replies.Didascalie: (Chewing on jamb of doorway near bridge)

Replies.Reply: Gonna lay some slugs on those overweight bugs!
Perceptor joins him.
Hey, Perceptor, what's shakin' other than this fortress?
We got Cassette Critters knockin' on the window!
No way. Two can play!
Sic 'em!
Let's hope so! Cause if I didn't we're gonna look like burnt out toaster ovens!
He reacts to muffled transmission from Jazz.
SOUNDWAVE moves forward and starts heaving CASSETTES upwards toward Blaster's Crows Nest position.
Rumble! Frenzy! Ravage! Ratbat! Eject!
Constructicons inferior.   Soundwave superior.
as they transform and attack the crows nest.
First we crack the shell.    Then we crack the nuts inside.
Hey, nobody calls Soundwave uncrazmatic.
as he spews out CASSETTES which TRANSFORM into CUBBIE, a lion, STRIPES, a tiger, STINGER, a scorpion and BOLTS, a small, tough robot.
as Bolts swats Frenzy into Stinger who JABS Stinger into Frenzy making him yowl and run.
As they fight Decepticons.
starts moving easily now.
Pushing on the busted catapult.
I was afraid you'd be trapped outside the city walls.
Replies.Didascalie: (pushing, manages to speak to Hot Rod. She likes him but doesn't want to go too far)

Replies.Reply: Hot Rod!
The Decepticons are retreating.
No, you'd better stay close to me. Blurr is trying to get Grimlock into Shuttle with the rest of the Dinobots as Decepticon FIRE COMES IN ALL AROUND.
Did we have to detonate three- quarters of the ship?!
Here, try it on.
For the first time out, you were great!
They're indestructible!
Didn't you hear Ultra Magnus. We don't have it anymore. Galvatron does.
Quick!   This way.
Daniel!
as he rises up and starts FIRING, HAMMERING, TEARING AWAY at metal shields which create armored walls of the transformed City.
and explode harmlessly as Devastator continues to grunt and tear off armored layers of the city. He grabs Hot Rod and Kup and starts to crush them.
Roars towards the Dinobots.
Uhhhh! Me Grimlock love challenge!
Me, Grimlock, not "nice Dino!" Me bash brains!
Me, Grimlock, love Kup's war stories!
Tell Grimlock about Petro-Rabbits again.
Groooooowwwwwrrrr!
Me, Grimlock, know all about wipers! Want to hear good part of story!
Yes, me, Grimlock, noble! Me, Grimlock search for friends.
Autobots.    Hot Rod and Kup.
Yes.   You know friends.   Where are they?
GRIMLOCK You good friend to Grimlock.    I reward you, sometime.
Argh!
Me, Grimlock think trees here are cheap model.
Who say that?
Me, Grimlock, "fool?"
Me, Grimlock, no like you!
Doooooooow! Why boy hit by dose?
Lowers his teeth to devour a much smaller Sharkticon, the Sharkticon bares his teeth, realizes that he's a second stringer, and scampers away.
Me Grimlock no bozo.   Me king!
Me Grimlock say execute them.
Maybe they make me king, too!
Yuck! Me Grimlock, not a kisser!   Me, Grimlock, a king!
Me Grimlock kick Butt.
Me, Grimlock, need new strategy.
As he is speaking, Auto-Combatant "sees"
his midsection now glowing and smoking, a huge hole where the Blaster has struck.
as he gathers his remaining strength and smashes Megatron with both fists clasped together.

He is practicing sparring with a SPINNING AUTO-COMBATANT - a very high tech quintain with many arms, legs, and weapons that test the user's skills, and reflexes. Hot Rod wears sparring gauntlet, and holds a small LASER DAGGER and special shield. As he lowers shield and reacts to Dinobot reactions to Kup's story.
Irked.
He slowly gets up and looks around the chamber.
He stands up and walks towards Galvatron.
Who fight each other for a place on the shuttle.
fire after them, closing ranks on the shuttle, and pouring shots into the melee.
emit bleeps and show oscilloscopic patterns but sounds and wave patterns are steadily growing weaker and weaker.
Prime, I'm just a soldier.   I'm not worthy.
All of his lights go out, including his eyes.

Rotating satellite dishes on the surface spark with electricity. Dissolve inside Unicron to reveal scenes of Prime's death and the passing of the Matrix to Ultra Magnus playing on various monitors. Some of the scenes are in slow motion, others are sped up. The effect should be eerie.
Welcome, Megatron.
I am Unicron.
I have summoned you here for a purpose.
Then it pleases me to be the first.
Bring me the Autobot Matrix. It is the one thing - the only thing that can stand in my way.
You exaggerate.
No. It has been passed to their new leader. Get it for me.
Your bargaining posture is highly dubious, but very well, I will provide you with a new body, and new troops to command.
And nothing.
Perhaps I misjudged you. Proceed on your way to oblivion. The Mist appears and starts to dissolve Megatron.
Excellent! Behold - Galvatron! X-ray images: wiring, circuitry, etc. flash on and off as a new and larger being starts to form, changing from dented Megatron to a huge, new creation: Galvatron.
Bit by bit, we see new    sections of the planet being generated.    Then, the sinister mist we saw at    the beginning of the film starts pouring    out.
You have failed.
Then where is the matrix?
The matrix can not be destroyed.
And Ultra Magnus lives on the planet of Junk. Stalk him. Cut him open! And bring the matrix to me.
Aren't we getting pompous?
You underestimate me Galvatron.
For a time, I considered sparing your measly little planet, but now you shall witness its dismemberment!
Graaaaaaaaaaa!
Destroy him, or feel yourself torn from limb to limb.
Jettison some weight, or I'll never make it to Cybertron.
Stop squabbling or we're gonna crash.
Fuse them!
In that case, I say it's survival of the fittest.
Who are you calling inferior.
Aye!
NAY!
Beat it!     Spare me!
What did he say his name was. He didn't.
LONG LIVE GALVATRON!
He shakes his fist.
The Constructicons form Devastator, the most powerful robot. We should rule.
Nobody would follow an uncharismatic bore like you.
Constructicons, unite!
Yeah!     Let's kick tailgate.
quake the ship so hard with their pile-driver arms that, with the help of Laserbeak, Buzzsaw and Ravage, they keep knocking the Constructicons off.
Death comes to anyone who crosses me. He attacks Blitzwing.
littering the otherwise beautiful technological expanse.
Long live Galvatron!
To Cybertron!
I will rip open Autobot after Autobot until it is yours, Unicron.
Coronation? This is bad comedy!
Here's a clue!
He transforms back to robot mode and confronts other Decepticons boastfully.
Will anyone else attempt to fill his shoes?
Galvatron.
How dare Unicron?!
Cybertron and all it's moons are mine!
There is no escape. I, Galvatron will crush you just as the magnificent Megatron crushed Prime!
aaaaaaaah!     Autobot cur!!
There are plenty of Autobots for you.
Damn it!! They did the same thing to me off Beta four!
Excellent. And soon we shall say the same of that infernal Unicron. Suddenly, Galvatron's body begins to twist, and he writhes in pain.
Why do you torture me?!
No, Unicron. Ultra Magnus is dead.
Destroyed, with him.
Sweeps, quarter him!
Unicron, my "master," with this I shall make you my slave!
Listen to me, or suffer the consequences.
I now possess that which you most fear.
No!!!
GALVATRON Stop feeding him, you fools!
It will do you no good, Autobot.   It cannot be opened.
Of course, my master!
Puny Autobot, you lack even Prime's courage. There is no response.
Come out, Autobot. We all must die sometime.
stumbles backward.
Die!
Nooooooo!
But remember, WE belong to HIM!
No survivors!
as Galvatron and his newly created force FLY UP AND AWAY with great speed.

The Decepticon plane looks slightly ridiculous with cloak on his shoulders and Thrust and Ramjet at his side, weapons held high, but ready for action should anybody question Starscream's rule. In front of him stands Astrotrain holding a huge Metallic CROWN over his head.
in neat ranks but their grim expressions show their displeasure.

Autobot City is almost rebuilt, and we see Kup and Hot Rod working with other Autobots to move large panels into position. In the background, two huge SPACE SHUTTLES are almost completed and Ultra Magnus is directing the work.
Roger me. Wilco me. Anything?    Hello.
is covered by Unicron's energy field, and slowly seems to dissolve.

Characters.Character: JAZZ AND CLIFFJUMPER ON THAT MOON

Replies.Reply: as quakes, tremors and cyclonic winds toss and tear at all structures on the moon and the energy field closes in on Jazz and Cliffjumper - who, using handholds every step of the way -
as Unicron looms larger, larger, the energy field seems to dissolve the landscape.

Characters.Character: GALVATRON IN DECEPTICON HALL OF HEROES

Replies.Reply: Silence. No more winds. No more movement.
You want me to gut Ultra Magnus for you?
Vaporize them!
The explosions jammed my sensors.
I have lost track of the Autobots!
The Autobots have been terminated!
Decepticons dive on fleeing Autobots.
Nice Dino, good, Dino, sweet Dino! Won't you step into the nice spaceship for Blurr? Please, pretty please.
Replies.Didascalie: (pleading with him, shoving him, talking very, very rapidly)

Replies.Reply: Weld? You? Really? Well, why not? Give it a try, but think it through first! Daniel knits his brow, extends FINGER OF EXO-
Practice, practice, practice!
Without the Matrix there is no hope.   No hope at all!
as they run into Dinobot Shuttle, retracting their entry ramp in  45.
as Hot Rod squeezes past   Sludge Swoop, and Slag to join Kup who is already at control deck where Grimlock sticks his head down to look out the window. Kup shoves him aside.

Characters.Character: ANOTHER PART OF SHUTTLE LAUNCH AREA

Kup and Hot Rod walk along a swampy, marshy area. Suddenly, there are several loud gurgles, and we can see the shapes of something terrible emerging through the muck. Hot Rod spins to fire, but Kup bats down his arm.
Sharkticons are smaller than the Autobots, but they look ugly and vicious.
slender, spindly framed robotic creatures with oversized five sided heads, each side bearing a different mechanistic face with a different expression on each -

as Hot Rod looks around and reacts sharply  HIS P.O.V.- THE QUINTESSONS  as we feature the Leader Quintesson who is taller and wears a different color robe from others. He is watching arrival of Kup and Hot Rod and his faces rotate so it goes from smiling face to suspicious face to angry face to furious grimace.

It plummets through the mountains and canyons of junk, narrowly avoiding crashing, but frequently hitting junk pinnacles or sides of junk walls, and causing avalanches of junk. By the time the ship lands, it is nearly indistinguishable from the junk.
